name: unwholesomeness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the quality or state of being unwholesome (= not good for you physically, morally, or emotionally): Their children perished from neglect and the unwholesomeness of their food. The unwholesomeness of the climate put a speedy end to their lives. See
unwholesome
More examplesFewer examplesHe does not like his neighborhood being dirtied up by petty crime and unwholesomeness.I don't have to deal with a lot of profanity or unwholesomeness.School sport taught me about the unwholesomeness of compulsion.
